item.title: What to Watch Out for When Buying a Used Car

item.description: A simple oversight turns into a $5,000 lesson in the car business — here’s what happened and how to avoid the same error.

item.description: A surprising story of buyer’s remorse — when a car that wasn’t a lemon still left the customer wishing they’d walked away.
